flavorText:
From jungle to sea, from sea to stone, from stone to field, from field to bone. What am I?
—Zhalfirin riddle

foreignData.name: Künstliche Gnome
foreignData.text:
{T}: Ein Zauberspruch Deiner Wahl ist farblos. Spiele diese Fähigkeit wie einen Unterbrechungszauber.
{T}: Eine bleibende karte Deiner Wahl ist farblos bis zum Ende des Zuges.

name: Ersatz Gnomes
originalText:
oc
T: Target spell is colorless. Play this ability as an interrupt.
oc
T: Target permanent is colorless until end of turn.

rulings.text: If Ersatz Gnomes targets a spell that becomes a permanent, the permanent will enter the battlefield colorless and will remain colorless until it leaves the battlefield (or until another effect changes its color).

text:
{T}: Target spell becomes colorless.
{T}: Target permanent becomes colorless until end of turn.
